revised_title: A New Classification and Species Descriptions for the Epileucon Genus
tldr: The author redefines the genus Epileucon Jones based on carapace, pereon, and appendage characters. They transfer several species from the genus Leucon to Epileucon and describe five new species. The study discusses the geographical distribution of the group, which is found in deep waters in the Atlantic, Pacific, and Indian oceans, as well as on the continental shelf off New Zealand.
